2131.subject: BUS
2131.descrlong: Firms are experiencing dramatic shifts in standard business practices caused by the emergence of a global electronic marketplace and investment in web commercialization.  Explores models  firms are applying in a socially responsible and ethical manner. Focuses on the marketing issues in commercialization of computer-mediated environments (CMEs) like the WWW and emerging electronic media. (Offered only as interest warrants; sections may be offered as classroom-based, hybrid or online courses.)
